name: light-that-burns-the-sky
effect: Inflicts damage using either Attack or Special Attack stat, whichever is higher. Determining which stat is used takes into account stat changes but not held items or abilities.
short_effect: Inflicts damage using either Attack or Special Attack stat, whichever is higher.

flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: This attack inflicts Attack or Sp. Atk damage— whichever stat is higher for the user, Necrozma. This move ignores the target’s Ability.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: This attack inflicts Attack or Sp. Atk damage— whichever stat is higher for the user, Necrozma. This move ignores the target’s Ability.
